thread.title: WAAAH! Sally Kohn goes full CAPS LOCK about #GorsuchHearing, trips over ‘Biden’s Rule’
thread.title_full: WAAAH! Sally Kohn goes full CAPS LOCK about #GorsuchHearing, trips over ‘Biden’s Rule’

author: Sam J.
title: WAAAH! Sally Kohn goes full CAPS LOCK about #GorsuchHearing, trips over ‘Biden’s Rule’
text:
WAAAH! Sally Kohn goes full CAPS LOCK about #GorsuchHearing, trips over ‘Biden’s Rule’ Posted at 12:08   Sam J.   
OMG!!! 
Sally is so upset over Neil Gorsuch having a hearing that she used a bunch of CAPS AND EXCLAMATION POINTS! Don't forget that Republicans DIDN'T EVEN GIVE OBAMA'S #SCOTUS NOMINEE A HEARING 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) March 21, 2017 
Those big mean Republicans! How dare they do what Democrats have done for decades! 
— The Arquette Sisters (@ArquetteSisters) March 21, 2017 
Yeah that’s right Sally, you have people like Chuck Schumer and especially Joe Biden to thank for Neil Gorsuch. 
Heck, we should send them both cookies. @sallykohn We didn't forget. It was named after his VP, aka "The Biden Rule". 
You didn't need to shout. 
— Gregg Hart (@RGreggHart)
